name: Stryt
problems: exposed to storms and supply interruptions
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Island Creole slang
custom: nightly tide-offerings and salt-curing festivals
food: smoked/salted fish staples; thrift and barter common
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind-influence and life-replacement magics are absent/banned locally
notes: population unknown; functions as minor coastal waypoint
strategic importance tied to reagent transshipment and navigational shelter
